content.raw:
To test this, I uninstalled gazebo completely, and the build fails:
~~~
Linking CXX executable gzserver
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "../../tools/make_ronn.py", line 9, in <module>
    process = subprocess.Popen([sys.argv[1], '-h'], stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/subprocess.py", line 679, in __init__
    errread, errwrite)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/subprocess.py", line 1259, in _execute_child
    raise child_exception
OSError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory
make[2]: *** [gazebo/gzserver-1.9.5] Error 1
make[1]: *** [gazebo/CMakeFiles/gzserver.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
~~~
